TopicTitle: So I'm looking for a mod and I don't know if it exists

Articles.Content: So I would really like to have some different colours of EVA suits rather than 50 Kerbals all wearing white, is there a mod for this or is it even possible? I had a look around but couldn't find anything

There's a mod called Texture Replacer, and it allows people to make textures to go over the defaults. I'll have a look and link it to you momentarily.

- - - Updated - - -

EDIT: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/72115-0-23-5-Green-Skull-Inc-Custom-Design-Spacesuits-v0-38-14th-April-14 Here's a custom spacesuit mod.

EDIT2: Here's another: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60961-0-23-5-TextureReplacer-1-4-2-%2816-4-2014%29

There's a mod called Texture Replacer, and it allows people to make textures to go over the defaults. I'll have a look and link it to you momentarily.
